title: How to Make Chocolate Candies

steps.headline: Melt chocolate using the microwave.
steps.description: Melt it for 40 seconds, stirring each time.

steps.headline: Get your molds out.
steps.description: While the chocolate is melting, have your molds out so you can pour in the chocolate. It may also be helpful to measure the sticks.

steps.headline: Spoon or pour the chocolate into the cavity of each mold.
steps.description: Trim it down with a knife if overfilled, but that can take more time.

steps.headline: Put chocolates in the freezer for about 10 minutes.
Let candy sit before bagging it.

text: Melt chocolate using the microwave. Melt it for 40 seconds, stirring each time. Get your molds out. While the chocolate is melting, have your molds out so you can pour in the chocolate. It may also be helpful to measure the sticks. Spoon or pour the chocolate into the cavity of each mold. Trim it down with a knife if overfilled, but that can take more time. Put chocolates in the freezer for about 10 minutes.  Let candy sit before bagging it.
